description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Pattaya, Thailand. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Grand Opening: Thailand Beachfront Oasis with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
hotels.description: Welcome to a newly opened five-star sanctuary that commands expansive views of the Gulf of Thailand, just 90 minutes from Bangkok. Here, thoughtful architecture celebrates local culture while establishing an exclusive retreat that captures Eastern Thailand's vibrant spirit. With a sparkling outdoor pool, pool bar and separate kids' pool, this is the ultimate place to escape it all. Indulge in a treatment at YHI Spa, savour Peking Duck from an authentic Chinese oven at Yitong Chinese Restaurant & Sky Bar, or enjoy fresh sushi and sashimi at DEN. The kids will love exploring the kids' club while the big kids take advantage of this beachfront location at the opulent LAY Beach Club. At the end of the day, venture up to Sky Bar for sunset ocean views that will take your breath away.

hotels.title: Thailand Coastal Cool near Pattaya Beach with Two Bars, Outdoor Pool & Kids' Water Park
hotels.description: Nestled along Thailand's thriving eastern seaboard, this hotel places you exactly where you want to be. You're a quick walk from the bars and restaurants of Beach Road, and a short drive from the Sanctuary of Truth, a breathtaking masterpiece celebrating Thai art and spirituality. Plus, the views over the Gulf of Thailand will take your breath away. The real showstopper is the water park - kids love it. When you're not splashing around or tackling the rock climbing wall, there's a rooftop pool that's perfect for sundowners. Molten restaurant serves up mouthwatering Thai food, and you have a choice of two bars with a wide selection of drinks and tasty light bites.

hotels.vendor_name: Movenpick Siam Hotel Na Jomtien Pattaya
hotels.title: Thailand Coastal Glamour in Pattaya with Sparkling Lagoon Pool & Direct Beach Access
hotels.description: Ascend to unparalleled luxury at Mövenpick’s skyline icon, offering breathtaking views over Na Jomtien Beach. Boasting four restaurants and bars, a serene day spa, a state-of-the-art fitness centre, direct beach access and a sprawling pool reminiscence of a lagoon, this is the very definition of five-star hospitality. Let time fade away as you surrender to the crystal-clear waters of Pattaya, or dive into a world of adventure with the plethora of water sports offered in the area. If you’d rather stay put, sip on a signature cocktail at the hotel’s swim-up bar while watching the sunset or feast on prime cuts of dry-aged beef at T55 New York Grill Room.

hotels.title: Family-Friendly Pattaya Beachfront Oasis with Spa, Onsen, Pools & Onsite Dining
hotels.description: Nestled between the trees, this charming coastal Thailand resort is a peaceful sanctuary a short drive from scenic attractions and hotspots in Pattaya. Andaz Pattaya Jomtien Beach is an oceanfront oasis amid a tropical landscape, with spacious rooms and suites perfect for unwinding. Enjoy spectacular seaside dining in the heart of the resort, ranging from freshly baked pizzas at La Cucina to the finest cuts of meat at Village Butcher. Alternatively, sit by the beach at the signature Fish Club for delicious seafood delights. Take a refreshing dip in the water court pool, the beachfront infinity pool or take the kids to the lagoon pool and let them immerse themselves in fun at Sanuk Sanuk Kids' Club next door. When it's time to truly unwind - relax at the spa, onsen and steam room.

hotels.title: Opulent Designer Thai Pool Villa Escape with Daily Breakfast
hotels.description: Leave the world behind for an ultra-luxe Thai villa escape at MASON, Pattaya, a romantic five-star retreat nestled by the golden sands of Na Jomtien. This charming town on the coast of Thailand lies just 3km south of Pattaya and a two-hour drive from bustling Bangkok. Here, days can be spent lazing on the seemingly endless stretch of beach, getting a dose of culture at Buddha Mountain in Pattaya, home to the largest engraved image of Buddha in the world, or exploring the stunning Wat Phra Yai Temple across the water. You may never want to venture far from your stunning designer resort, built in 2019 and a relative newcomer to the area. MASON, Pattaya's iconic Sky Pool beckons for a sunset dip, while the spa offers holistic treatments and the onsite bars and restaurants are always happy to whip up a delicious meal or handcrafted cocktail. Your private villa is the cherry on top, with an ultra-modern glass design, private saltwater pool, jacuzzi and luxe bathroom with oversized bathtub. **Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights)** - Wake up to **daily breakfast** at Zila Street Bistro & Bar, serving fresh, locally sourced ingredients with panoramic views of Pattaya Bay - Relax with **one 30-minute massage per adult** at the spa (for stays of 2+ nights) - Head to the Beachside Bar for **one daily cocktail, beer or smoothie per adult** (for stays of 3+ nights) - Choose between a Thai or Western **three-course set-menu dinner** at Zila Street Bistro & Bar (for stays of 3+ nights) - Splash out on additional drinks, dining or spa treatments with **THB2,000 resort credit per package** (for stays of 5+ nights) **Looking for added luxury?** Upgrade to a beautiful beachfront villa and wake to the sound of the ocean.

hotels.title: Five-Star Sun-Kissed Bangkok Oasis in the Heart of Pattaya
hotels.description: Treat yourself to a tranquil stay at the luxury InterContinental Pattaya Resort, an IHG Hotel - a beachfront oasis just a 90-minute drive from Bangkok. With spacious guestrooms and suites offering traditional Thai style and modern facilities, this five-star hideaway promises an escape that celebrates relaxation, comfort and exquisite design. Make the most of the three luxurious lagoon-style pools, the Amburaya Spa, the Planet Trekkers Programme for kids and top-class dining venues, bars and lounges.

hotels.title: Pullman Seaside Luxury in Pattaya with Direct Beach Access & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Get up close to the vibrant energy of Thailand's Pattaya City with a luxurious stay at this beachfront Pullman wonder. Resting on the stunning Wong Amat Beach, this stylish retreat offers direct beach access and a swanky Beach Club Bar & Restaurant, serving up exotic drinks and par excellence international cuisine with a local twist. An outdoor pool, Thai-therapy-inspired Aisawan Spa and beautiful sea views are a promise well-kept at this tropical paradise. Within close proximity, you'll find the bustling Walking Street, boasting street food stalls and bustling boutiques, while the nearby Sanctuary of Truth offers an insight into local culture.

hotels.title: Beachfront Pattaya Resort with Rooftop Bar and Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: ​Discover the best of Pattaya with a stay at this oceanfront oasis, directly positioned on Na Jomtien Beach's spectacular sands. After days spent enjoying the city's many historic and cultural charms, retreat to The Jetty rooftop bar for cocktails and sweeping sea views, savour authentic Thai cuisine at The Deck or laze by the resort's magnificent resort pool. Pattaya's bustling Floating Market is a riverside attraction filled with local eateries and unique boutiques, located just a 10-minute drive from the resort. Travel 20 minutes to explore Nong Nooch Botanical Garden's themed landscapes or Khao Chi Chan's impressive Buddha engravings, an enduring symbol of Thailand's cultural and religious history.

hotels.title: Pattaya Five-Star Beachside Retreat Just 90 Minutes from Bangkok
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in tropical tranquility at Avani Pattaya Resort, a surf and sand sanctuary on Thailand's golden east coast, just 90 minutes from bustling Bangkok. Experience luxurious treatments at AvaniSpa, indulge in a variety of cuisines at the many onsite restaurants or sink your toes into the white sands of the nearby beach. Be spoiled for choice with a range of shopping and entertainment options from modern malls to bustling markets, build up an appetite in an authentic cooking class or cool off with a plunge into the sapphire sea.
